item.title: About
item.description: About slowman The slowman is a simple tool to measure the speed of your internet connection. It is written in Python and uses the Tkinter GUI toolkit. Slowman is a fork of the original. The original is written in C and uses the GTK+ toolkit. The original is no longer available. Installation Don’t install slowman. It is not a package. It is a person. Usage Don’t use slowman. It is not a package.
